resources.string: "BOM character detected, skipped."
"Unknown escape sequence. Character is used as normal."
"Malformed escape sequence."
"Invalid character in token. Token is skipped.
"Integer exceeds the maximal number of digits. Numeric result is unpredictable!"
"Malformed integer. No numeric characters were found."
"Malformed integer. Ending was truncated."
"Hexadecimal integer exceeds the maximal number of digits. Numeric result is unpredictable!"
"Malformed hexadecimal integer. No hexadecimal characters were found."
"Malformed hexadecimal integer. Ending was truncated."
"Malformed color value. No numeric characters were found."
"Malformed color value. Returning opaque white color."
"Missing color token. Returning opaque white color."
"Malformed color value. Ending was truncated."
"Fraction exceeds the maxmaximal number of digits. Numeric result is unpredictable!"
"Malformed fraction. No numeric characters were found."
"Malformed fraction. Ending was truncated."
"Keyword exceeds the maximal number of characters! Token hardKeyCode is not unique!
"Malformed keyword. Ending was truncated."
"String constant is not terminated properly."
"character constant is empty. Null is returned."
"Character constant is missing. Null is returned."
"Character constant is not terminated properly. Remaining token part is skipped."
"Unknown token type."
"Remark finishes at EOF."
